item.description:
This is a Level 2+ event due to the colder water temps. Please have the necessary skills and cold water gear if you plan to attend this event.

This afternoon paddle will allow us to take advantage of the mid afternoon High Tide which is at 3pm and the warmest temps of the day. We'll decide where to paddle based on the winds on Sunday. Some options are Seabrook Harbor up Hampton River, Seabrook Harbor up Blackwater River, Seabrook Harbor up into the estuaries or if the ocean is calm head out of the Harbor to paddle along the coast. Their may be some good surf in the bowl later in the afternoon as well for those surf junkies.

Due to the colder water temps a wet suit or drysuit is mandatory for attending this event. Also dress in layers and bring extra warm clothing.

We'll meet at the beach in Seabrook Harbor next to where Seacoast Kayak used to be. If your coming from the North follow Rt. 1A through Hampton Beach and after you cross the bridge there is big a parking lot on the right just past the Commercial Fishing Pier.

After the paddle we'll stop at a local restaurant for dinner.
item.name: Seabrook/Hampton Harbor Paddle
